title: DID Method Registry Entry
description: JSON schema for DID method registry entries following the DID Registration specification from https://identity.foundation/did-registration/

name.description: The DID method name (e.g., 'web', 'key', 'ion'). This becomes the method identifier in 'did:method:id' format.

specification.description: URL to the full DID method specification document

contact.description: Contact information for the method maintainers

name.description: Name of the maintainer or organization

url.description: URL to maintainer website or documentation

implementations.description: List of implementations available for this DID method. Each implementation typically includes a driverUrl pointing to a resolver service.

driverUrl.description: URL to the driver/resolver service for this implementation. Typically a Universal Resolver endpoint.

testNet.description: Whether this implementation is for a test network
